alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 12:58AM MST until December 31 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains, Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. This will affect South Pass making travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may continue for another day or more after the aforementioned period. Stay tuned for updates.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
